name: Blood Bath (Laster33)
description:
Blood Bath is a top down arena shooter where you play as a vampire that fights againts villagers. You can shoot magic missiles from your wand and turn into a bat. But dead blood is poisonous for you , so you should avoid contact with it. I hope you enjoy it!

                                                                                        STORY

    You are a vampire, and after a long night of feeding you return to your castle. But this time villagers notice you and follow you. They start attacking  while sun rising. Now you had no choice but to fight.
